mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.name AS "name", a.item_id AS "itemId", a.default_flag AS "defaultFlag", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bj_examination_result_dict( id, name, item_id, default_flag, del_flag, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{name}, #{itemId}, #{defaultFlag}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks} )
mapper.update: UPDATE bj_examination_result_dict SET name = #{name}, item_id = #{itemId}, default_flag = #{defaultFlag}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
